name: The Coveted Mirror
storyline:
The once placid medival village of Starbury groans under the iron-fisted rule of the black-hearted, squinty-eyed King Voar. The dazzling Mirror that the wizard Munjistan once used to protect Starbury is now broken into five pieces, of which Voar the Vermin has four. The power of the whole mirror is absolute, and the tyrant will stop at nothing to find the missing piece. However, should a champion find it first, Voar's power can be broken.

Champions are scarce these days, for Voar is virtually omniscient, able to spy on his enemies at all times. You may not aspire to being a champion, but your first meeting with Voar will change that. Do you have the ingenuity to find the Coveted Mirror?
summary: After the evil Voar has taken over reign of the once peaceful kingdom of Starbury it is your task to find the missing fifth piece of the Coveted Mirror in order to restore order once again to Starbury.
